item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 5, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Getting my daily news from a dot matrix printer (587 points | 175 comments)
2. Meta Movie Gen (793 points | 725 comments)
3. LLMs, Theory of Mind, and Cheryl's Birthday (79 points | 33 comments)

5. "Women and Children First!" (25 points | 20 comments)
6. Mitmproxy 11: Full HTTP/3 Support (99 points | 15 comments)
7. How were 70s versions of games like Pong built without a programmable computer? (91 points | 40 comments)
8. Show HN: Detect if an audio file was generated by NotebookLM (10 points | 2 comments)
9. Versable (YC W22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
10. Don't squander public trust on bullshit (96 points | 42 comments)
11. Show HN: Chebyshev approximation calculator (227 points | 38 comments)
12. 12 Months of Mandarin (339 points | 201 comments)
13. The other British invasion: how UK lingo conquered the US (65 points | 107 comments)
14. Show HN: Open source framework OpenAI uses for Advanced Voice (92 points | 15 comments)
15. ESP32: leaving love notes and entering demoscene territory (2022) (122 points | 11 comments)
16. Teenage hacker became a legend attacking companies, then his rivals attacked him (60 points | 37 comments)
17. Show HN: FFmpeg-over-IP – Connect to remote FFmpeg servers (85 points | 42 comments)
18. Computer scientists combine two 'beautiful' proof methods (72 points | 15 comments)
19. One pioneering grizzly and her two cubs appear on Vancouver Island (10 points | 3 comments)
20. 炊紙(kashikishi) is a text editor that utilizes GPU to edit text in a 3D space (17 points | 4 comments)
21. Show HN: A tool for creating chord charts on the go (120 points | 31 comments)
22. ESP8266 Analog Broadcast Television Interface (100 points | 15 comments)
23. Heisenberg and the early days of quantum mechanics (1976) [pdf] (6 points | 1 comment)
24. Max Schrems wins privacy case against Meta over data on sexual orientation (86 points | 53 comments)
25. Self-locking and stiffening deployable tubular structures (63 points | 6 comments)
26. Bureaucrat Mode (67 points | 37 comments)
27. Reverse engineering and dismantling Kekz headphones (185 points | 35 comments)
28. Experimental web browser optimized for rabbit-holing (523 points | 100 comments)
29. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (895 points | 375 comments)
30. Knowledge Growth and Specialization: Evidence from Oncologists (45 points | 3 comments)
